DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate corneal confocal microscopic finding , ocular sign symptoms patient treatment preserve prostaglandin analogue latanoprost 0.005 % eye drop ( Xalatan® ) switch preservative-free prostaglandin analog tafluprost 0.0015 % eye drop ( Taflotan® ) . Patients use latanoprost prior medication ( least 6 month ) fulfil inclusion criterion include specify ocular symptom sign , switch latanoprost 0.005 % eye drop assign preservative-free tafluprost 0.0015 % eye drop twelve ( 12 ) month .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Preservative-free Prostaglandin Eye Drops Sign Symptoms Eyes Patients With Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome measure : 1 . Change screen corneal confocal microscopic finding month 12 2 . Change screen ocular symptom upon non-instillation month 12 3 . Change screen ocular sign month 12 Safety QoL variable : 4 . Descriptive statistic , identification change ( ) screening
DOC.criteria: Have provide write informed consent Aged 18 year A diagnosis ocular hypertension openangle glaucoma ( either POAG capsular glaucoma ) one eye , patient regularly use latanoprost 0.005 % ( Xalatan® ) least six month Screening ( confirm anamnesis ) In Screening visit evaluation , presence : At least two ocular symptom consider two eye together ( irritation/burning/stinging , foreign body sensation , tear , itch dry eye sensation ) least mild severity ( grade ≥ 2 ) upon noninstillation OR One ocular symptom least mild severity ( grade ≥ 2 ) upon noninstillation AND At least one follow ocular sign either eye prior treatment : Fluorescein tear breakup time ( fBUT ) : le 10 second Corneal conjunctival fluorescein staining : Corneal fluorescein stain score least grade I OR Combined nasal temporal staining score least grade II Blepharitis : least mild severity ( grade ≥ 1 ) Conjunctival redness/hyperemia : least mild severity ( grade 1 ) Tear production : 10 mm less Schirmer test A best correct ETDRS visual acuity score +0.6 logMAR good eye Negative pregnancy test result screen visit , , consistently correctly use reliable method contraception study Are willing follow instruction Females pregnant , nurse planning pregnancy , females childbearing potential use reliable method contraception Anterior chamber angle either eye treat less grade 2 accord Schaffer classification measure gonioscopy Any corneal abnormality condition prevent reliable applanation tonometry , include prior refractive eye surgery IOP great 22 mmHg 15:00 IOP measurement either eye Screening/Baseline visit Use preserve eye drop ( latanoprost ) include artificial tear screen within two week prior screen visit Diagnosis angleclosure glaucoma secondary glaucoma capsular glaucoma either eye Suspected contraindication tafluprost therapy ( hypersensitivity tafluprost excipients ) Glaucoma filtration surgery ocular surgery ( include ocular laser procedure ) within 6 month prior
